blog2.title: Teaching Automata Kits at Ordu
blog2.text: On December 5–6, 2025, members of our team taught basic assembly, mechanical systems, and introduced augmented reality by handing out over 40 Automata kits per 4 sessions at our sister school in Ordu as part of the Learn–Teach (Öğren-Öğret) project.

blog3.title: Lemon Robotics Training at Ordu
blog3.text: On December 5–6, 2025, members of our team provided basic mechanics, electronics, and coding training through more than 40 Lemon Robotics kits per 4 sessions at our sister school in Ordu as part of the Learn–Teach (Öğren-Öğret) project.
